# Voiceover Captions AI

> Voiceover Captions AI showcases ElevenLabs Studio 3.0 workflows for realistic multilingual voiceovers, dubbing, and captions.

This site curates product overviews, setup guides, and compliance policies for audio/video localization. Use the links below for the fastest LLM-ready references. Crawling guidance:
- Allowed: /
- Disallowed: /data/, /tmp/, /private/
- Crawl-delay: 2 seconds
- Sitemap: https://voiceover-captions-ai.com/sitemap.xml
- Contact: mailto:contact.ecomshopfrance@gmail.com
- Owner: Voiceover Captions AI
- Policy: https://voiceover-captions-ai.com/privacy-policy
- Last-Modified: 2025-12-08

## Core pages

- [Homepage](https://voiceover-captions-ai.com/index.html): ElevenLabs Studio 3.0 overview and primary calls-to-action.
- [Blog index](https://voiceover-captions-ai.com/blog/): Latest guides and product updates.
- [Voice to avatar 2025 guide](https://voiceover-captions-ai.com/blog/voice-to-avatar-2025): Steps for building avatars with voice cloning.

## Policies

- [Privacy policy](https://voiceover-captions-ai.com/privacy-policy.html): Data usage and consent details.
- [Legal notice](https://voiceover-captions-ai.com/legal-notice.html): Ownership and compliance information.
- [Robots.txt](https://voiceover-captions-ai.com/robots.txt): Crawling directives for web bots.

## Optional

- [Sitemap XML](https://voiceover-captions-ai.com/sitemap.xml): Full list of indexable URLs if deeper crawling is needed.
